name: HealthEquity, Inc.
description: HealthEquity, Inc. is a leading provider of health savings accounts (HSAs) and other consumer-directed benefits that empower individuals to take control of their healthcare spending. Founded in 2002, HealthEquity focuses on the integration of health and wealth, providing tools and services that help individuals save and invest for healthcare expenses. The company’s platform allows users to manage their HSAs, flexible spending accounts (FSAs), health reimbursement arrangements (HRAs), and other benefits in one place. HealthEquity is committed to promoting health savings as a vital part of financial wellness, offering educational resources and personalized support to enhance consumer engagement. The company partners with employers, health plans, and financial institutions to deliver innovative solutions that drive healthcare savings and improve outcomes. With a growing emphasis on consumerism in healthcare, HealthEquity is well-positioned to lead the industry in transforming how individuals manage their healthcare finances. The company’s mission is to improve health and financial well-being by making healthcare more affordable and accessible for everyone.

seo.meta_description: Discover HealthEquity, Inc., a leader in health savings accounts and consumer-directed benefits. Explore how HealthEquity empowers individuals to manage their healthcare finances.

faq.question: What does HealthEquity do?
faq.answer: HealthEquity provides health savings accounts and consumer-directed benefits to help individuals manage their healthcare expenses.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of HealthEquity?
faq.answer: Jon Kessler is the CEO of HealthEquity, Inc.

faq.question: Where is HealthEquity headquartered?
faq.answer: HealthEquity is headquartered in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA.

faq.question: What are HealthEquity's main products?
faq.answer: HealthEquity's main products include Health Savings Accounts (HSAs), Flexible Spending Accounts (FSAs), and Health Reimbursement Arrangements (HRAs).
